Articles.Content:
A simple mission I demonstrated on my video preview - test an aircraft under the direction of Gene Kerman

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1S4fGIGe1hhgi2UKS4EnsQ_IoTA8jNcVE/view?usp=sharing
Nice mission, I saw your video of this and now I can look at the mission in the builder.

Great starter mission showing zoning and custom simple scripts for the npc's! Cannot wait to see what a great "winding down" night brings once you get up to speed and into the groove. (Whenever / If that does happen lol.)
